sql.sql: select g.zdsswfajxxgbdjbuuid, g.swjg_dm, g.jcajxxuuid, g.djxh, g.zcdz, g.fddbrfzrxb, g.fddbrsfzjhm, g.jfypjqddsjzrrxm, g.wfssfssfddbrfzrxm, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgmc, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgzjzrrxm, g.wsbh, g.ggrq, g.zdsswfajxzlxmc, g.zywfss, g.flyjjclcfqk, g.ajzt_dm, g.swcljdswszg, g.swxzcfjdswszg, g.jfypjqddsjzrrxb_dm, g.jfypjqddsjzrrzjmc, g.jfypjqddsjzrrzjzjhm, g.jfypjqdfyzjzzdcwryxb, g.jfypjqdfyzjzzdcwrysfzhm, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgnsrsbh, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgzcdz, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgzjzrrxb, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgzjzrrzjhm, g.zyzgzsbh, j.jcajbh, j.yjskze yjbjsk, j.yjfkze yjfk, j.yjznjze yjznj, j.sjskze yjbjsk1, j.sjfkze yjfk1, j.sjznjze yjznj1, '' zdsswfajxxchgbsqbuuid, null ccyy, null ccrq, '' ccdw from jc_zdsswfajxxgbdjb g, jc_ajxx j where g.jcajxxuuid = j.jcajxxuuid and j.ajszjg_dm = ? and g.ajzt_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or g.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.zdsswfajxzlxmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.fddbrsfzjhm = ?) and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(g.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' union all select g.zdsswfajxxgbdjbuuid, g.swjg_dm, g.jcajxxuuid, g.djxh, g.zcdz, g.fddbrfzrxb, g.fddbrsfzjhm, g.jfypjqddsjzrrxm, g.wfssfssfddbrfzrxm, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgmc, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgzjzrrxm, g.wsbh, g.ggrq, g.zdsswfajxzlxmc, g.zywfss, g.flyjjclcfqk, g.ajzt_dm, g.swcljdswszg, g.swxzcfjdswszg, g.jfypjqddsjzrrxb_dm, g.jfypjqddsjzrrzjmc, g.jfypjqddsjzrrzjzjhm, g.jfypjqdfyzjzzdcwryxb, g.jfypjqdfyzjzzdcwrysfzhm, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgnsrsbh, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgzcdz, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgzjzrrxb, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgzjzrrzjhm, g.zyzgzsbh, j.jcajbh, c.yjbjsk, c.yjfk, c.yjznj, c.yjbjsk_1, c.yjfk_1, c.yjznj_1, c.zdsswfajxxchgbsqbuuid, c.ccyy, c.ccrq, c.ccdw from jc_zdsswfajxxgbdjb g, jc_ajxx j, jc_zdsswfajxxchgbsqb c where g.jcajxxuuid = j.jcajxxuuid and g.zdsswfajxxgbdjbuuid = c.zdsswfajxxgbdjbuuid and j.ajszjg_dm = ? and g.ajzt_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or g.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.zdsswfajxzlxmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or g.fddbrsfzjhm = ?) and nvl(j.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(g.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.lcslid from jc_sxfzajys_jgb t where t.jcajxxuuid =$uuid$ and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select t.jcajbh wfxwbh, t.djxh, 'Y' AS sfsbfwf,t.ajmc as wfxwmc,t.gfjcajxxuuid as sswfxwdjuuid from Jc_Gfjcajxx t where t.gfjcajxxuuid = $value2$ and NVL(t.zfbz_1,'N') = $value4$ union all select t.wfxwbh wfxwbh, t.djxh, t.sfsbfwf,t.wfxwmc,t.sswfxwdjuuid from fz_sswfxwdj t where t.sswfxwdjuuid = $value5$ and NVL(t.zfbz_1,'N') = $value8$ and NVL(t.sfsbfwf,'N') = $value10$
select t.* from jc_lhcjgzcxtjb t where t.lhcjgzcxtjbuuid = ? and t.zfbz_1='N'

select a.jcajxxuuid from jc_ajxx a where a.ajjczt_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or jcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or nsrmc like ?) and a.AJSZJG_DM = ? and NVL(a.SFGB_1, ?) = ? and a.jcajxxuuid in( select t.ajxxuuid from zh_sdxx t where t.sdzt_dm = ? and t.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and t.wssdsj + 75 < sysdate and t.lrrq > to_date('2012-10-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') union select ajxxuuid from zh_sdxx t where t.sdzt_dm = ? and t.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and add_months(t.wssdsj, 6) < sysdate and t.lrrq > to_date('2012-10-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd'))
select t. * from JC_FCJL t where t.fcajqcuuid= $uuid$ AND nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$ order by t.lrrq desc

SELECT DM.DZBZDSZLMC, DM.DZBZDSZL_DM, LJ.XMLZHBEANLLJ, LJ.YWBDSJLJ, ZB.XMLLSH, ZB.YWWSUUID, NVL(NVL(ZB.WSBH, ZB.WSZG), '无') WH, ZB.UUID, LJ.BDLJMC, LJ.CSDMZ_1, LJ.LCBZ, ZB.LRR_DM ZRRXM, ZB.LCSLID, zb.lrrq, ZB.Wszzgz_Dm, ZB.Jgssswjg_Dm FROM CS_JC_WSSPLJ LJ, GY_WS_WSZB ZB, DM_GY_DZBZDSZL DM WHERE LJ.DZBZDSZL_DM = ZB.DZBZDSZL_DM AND ZB.DZBZDSZL_DM = DM.DZBZDSZL_DM AND ZB.Lcslid = ? AND ZB.ZFR_DM IS NULL order by zb.lrrq
SELECT T.* FROM JC_AYXX_SWSXTZS T WHERE T.JCAYXXUUID = $uuid$ AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select t.swjcbguuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.bcdxdjbqk, t.jcqkjfxwt, t.clyjjjy, t.bgrq_1, t.swjg_dm, t.zfbz_1, t.sjslid, t.jcryqm_1, t.wsbh, t.jcbmfzrqm, t.qtqksm, t.wszzrq, t.yxbz from JC_SWJCBG t where nvl(t.zfbz_1,'N')= 'N' and (t.jcajxxuuid = ? or t.jcajbh = ?)
select c.* from jc_lhcjgzcxtjbc c where c.lhcjgzcxtjbuuid=? and c.zfbz_1='N'
SELECT T.* FROM JC_SWJCAJYJZLJJQD T WHERE T.JCAJXXUUID = $uuid$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm is null and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$

select t.ajzbdw_dm, t.dbbh, t.djxh, t.cbsx, t.xbjg_dm, t.zcajbz, t.dbzrbm_dm, t.dbzrry_dm, t.jcayxxuuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.cbjgswj_Dm, t.xbjgswj_Dm, t.zdsswfajbqdcbuuid from jc_zdsswfajdblxxxb t where t.zdsswfajbqdcbuuid = $uuid$
select t.* from jc_swjcajqlsqb_qc t where t.ajqlsqbuuid = $uuid$
select b.* from jc_lhcjgzcxtjbb b where b.lhcjgzcxtjbuuid=? and b.zfbz_1='N'

select c.zdsswfajxxchgbsqbuuid, c.swclcfqk, c.yjbjsk, c.yjbjsk_1, c.yjznj, c.yjznj_1, c.yjfk, c.yjfk_1, c.lcslid, c.ccyy, c.ccrq, c.ccdw, c.wsbh, c.sqr_dm, c.sqrq, g.djxh, g.zdsswfajxxgbdjbuuid, g.zcdz, g.fddbrfzrxb, g.fddbrsfzjhm, g.jfypjqddsjzrrxm, g.wfssfssfddbrfzrxm, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgmc, g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgzjzrrxm, g.swjg_dm, g.ggrq, g.zdsswfajxzlxmc, g.zywfss, g.flyjjclcfqk, g.ajzt_dm, g.swcljdswszg, g.swxzcfjdswszg,g.jfypjqddsjzrrxb_dm,g.jfypjqddsjzrrzjmc,g.jfypjqddsjzrrzjzjhm,g.jfypjqdfyzjzzdcwryxb, g.jfypjqdfyzjzzdcwrysfzhm,g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgnsrsbh,g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgzcdz,g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgzjzrrxb,g.fyzjzrdsszyfwjgzjzrrzjhm, g.zyzgzsbh, a.jcajxxuuid, a.jcajbh, a.ajmc from jc_zdsswfajxxchgbsqb c, jc_zdsswfajxxgbdjb g, jc_ajxx a where c.zdsswfajxxgbdjbuuid = g.zdsswfajxxgbdjbuuid and g.jcajxxuuid = a.jcajxxuuid and c.zdsswfajxxchgbsqbuuid = ? and c.lcslid = ? and nvl(c.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(g.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select distinct (jh.jhnd) as jhnd, jh.jhnd || jh.zdjhdjcjg_dm code, jh.jhnd || '稽查计划' caption, jh.zdjhdjcjg_dm pcode from jc_jcjh jh where jh.zdjhdjcjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(jh.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and nvl(jh.wszt_dm, '01') = ? and nvl(jh.xfbz, 'N') = ? and nvl(jh.zstybz, '0') = ? union all select '' as jhnd, jh.jcjhuuid code, nvl(jh.jcjhmc, jh.jhnd || '稽查计划') caption, jh.jhnd || jh.zdjhdjcjg_dm pcode from jc_jcjh jh where jh.zdjhdjcjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(jh.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? and nvl(jh.wszt_dm, '01') = ? and nvl(jh.xfbz, 'N') = ? and nvl(jh.zstybz, '0') = ?

SELECT * FROM CS_DJ_SWJGGXGWXZQHDZB A, DM_GY_XZQH xzqh where a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and xzqh.xybz = 'Y' and xzqh.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xzqhsz_dm = xzqh.xzqhsz_dm and a.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg swjg where level = ? START WITH swjg.swjg_dm = ? AND XYBZ = 'Y' CONNECT BY PRIOR swjg.swjg_dm = swjg.sjswjg_dm)
select a.* from jc_lhcjgzcxtjba a where a.lhcjgzcxtjbuuid=? and a.zfbz_1='N'

select t.jcajbh wfxwbh, t.djxh, 'Y' AS sfsbfwf,t.ajmc as wfxwmc,t.gfjcajxxuuid as sswfxwdjuuid from Jc_Gfjcajxx t where substr(t.gfjcajzt_dm, 0, 2) in ($value1$) and t.djxh = $value2$ and NVL(t.zfbz_1,'N') = $value4$ union all select t.wfxwbh wfxwbh, t.djxh, t.sfsbfwf,t.wfxwmc,t.sswfxwdjuuid from fz_sswfxwdj t where t.djxh = $value5$ and t.sswfxwclzt_dm != $value6$ and NVL(t.zfbz_1,'N') = $value8$ and NVL(t.sfsbfwf,'N') = $value10$

SELECT A.WSBH, A.SSWFXWJJDJBUUID FROM JC_SSWFXWJJDJB A, JC_AYXXTHBZH B WHERE A.SSWFXWJJDJBUUID = B.JCAYXXUUID AND B.DJXH = ? AND B.DZBZDSZL_DM = ? AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND B.ISLYJJ = 'Y' ORDER BY A.LRRQ DESC

select a.zcjjclxhuuid, a.lcslid, a.hdslid, a.jbr_dm, a.wsbh, a.spyj, a.spyjsm, a.sprq, a.spr, a.wszzrq, a.sjgsdq, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.zfr_dm, a.zfrq_1, a.zfbz_1 from jc_zcjjclxhb a where a.zcjjclxhuuid = ? and a.lcslid = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select t.JCSSFAUUID, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.ZDR_DM, t.ZDRQ, t.JCMD, t.ZTSSBZ, t.sjslid, t.ZFBZ_1, t.ZFRQ_1, t.ZFR_DM from JC_SSFA t where t.jcssfauuid = $uuid$
SELECT T.* FROM JC_FCJL T, JC_FCAJQC A WHERE T.FCAJQCUUID = A.FCAJQCUUID AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND A.JCAJXXUUID = $uuid$
select e.* from jc_lhcjgzcxtjbe e where e.lhcjgzcxtjbuuid=? and e.zfbz_1='N'
select t.* from jc_swjcajyjzljjqd t where t.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and t.sshj_dm = $value$ and t.dzbzdszl_dm = $key$ and t.zfbz_1 = $zfbz1$
select djb.ajzt_dm from Jc_Zdsswfajxxgbdjb djb where djb.jcajxxuuid=? and nvl(djb.zfbz_1, 'N') = ?

select l.zcjjclxhlbuuid, l.ywsbh, l.zcjjclxhuuid, l.sswfxwjjdjbuuid, l.bjjrnsrsbh, l.bjjrmc, l.bjjrdjxh, l.ajszjg_dm, l.jjrq_1, l.pzzcclrq, l.xhly, l.bz, l.lrrq, l.lrr_dm, l.zfr_dm, l.zfrq_1, l.xgr_dm, l.xgrq from Jc_Zcjjclxhlb l where l.zcjjclxhuuid = ? and l.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select b.jcaybh, b.nsrmc, a.jcssqjq, a.jcssqjz, a.xafxjlayj, b.gdhzbz, a.jcayxxuuid, a.swjclasqbuuid, decode (c.tzsuuid,null,'N','Y') as bz_1 from jc_lasqb a, jc_ayxx b, Jc_Ayxx_Swsxtzs c where a.jcayxxuuid = b.jcayxxuuid(+) and b.jcayxxuuid = c.jcayxxuuid(+) and a.swjclasqbuuid in (#macroparam#)
select t.jcjysuuid, t.jcajxxuuid, t.sy, t.jcjy, t.jcbm_dm, t.czrq_1, t.swjg_dm, t.czry_dm, t.wsbh, t.zfbz_1 from Jc_Jcjys t where T.jcjysuuid = $uuid$
SELECT T.* FROM JC_AYXXTHBZH T WHERE T.SJSLID = $uuid$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select t.bguuid, t.wsbh, t.ssqq, t.ssqz, t.bgnr, t.bgr, t.bgjg_dm, t.bgrq_1, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.zfbz_1, t.lcslid, t.fjuuid from jc_lhcjbg t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.bguuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.lcslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.bgjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ((t.ssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.ssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) OR (t.ssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.ssqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) OR (t.ssqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.ssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))))

with m as (select jcajxxuuid, skssqq, case when zsxm_dm = '10101' then decode(xxsesbs, null, 0, xxsesbs) + decode(xxsetzse, null, 0, xxsetzse) - decode(xxsetjse, null, 0, xxsetjse) - decode(jxsesbs, null, 0, jxsesbs) - decode(jxsetzse, null, 0, jxsetzse) + decode(jxsetjse, null, 0, jxsetjse) - decode(ldsetze, null, 0, ldsetze) - decode(ynsesbs, null, 0, ynsesbs) else (decode(a.jsyjsbs, null, 0, a.jsyjsbs) + decode(a.jsyjtzs, null, 0, a.jsyjtzs)) * decode(a.sldwse, null, 0, a.sldwse) - decode(a.ynse_1, null, 0, a.ynse_1) end as ybtse from jc_swcljdqkb a where jcajxxuuid in (#macroparam#) and a.wfwzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N') select jcajxxuuid from m group by jcajxxuuid having sum (m.ybtse) >= 1000000
SELECT * FROM JC_DQZBZLQD T WHERE T.DQZBZLQDUUID = $uuid$ AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM JC_AYXX_SWSXTZS T WHERE T.TZSUUID = $uuid$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'
select * from JC_SWJCGZDGY_MX mx where mx.jcgzdgyuuid =?
select b.* from Jc_Smwjclbmcns b where b.smwjclbmcnsuuid = $uuid$ and b.lcslid = $lcslid$ and b.zfbz_1 = $zfbz1$
SELECT T.* FROM JC_AYXX T WHERE T.LCSLID = ? AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?

select t.swjcbguuid, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.wfwzxw_dm, t.wfwzlx_dm, t.jsyjsbs, t.jsyjtzs, t.mbyqndks, t.sl_1, t.ynse, t.ynse_1, t.ybtse, t.ncfbs, t.ncfje, t.zgswjg_dm, t.mswfsdje, t.xxsesbs, t.ynsesbs, t.ldsesbs, t.xxsetzse, t.xxsetjse, t.jxsetzse, t.jxsetjse, t.sjslid, t.hdslid, t.bz_1, t.ldsetze, t.jxsesbs, t.zszm_dm, t.hy_dm, t.djxh, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.sfxcznjqs, t.qcldse, t.znjjsrqq, t.znjjsrqz, t.zszspm_dm from JC_NCBTSKHZB t where t.swjcbguuid = ? order by t.zspm_dm asc, t.skssqq asc, t.skssqz asc

with m as (select jcajxxuuid, (decode(a.jsyjsbs, null, 0, a.jsyjsbs) + decode(a.jsyjtzs, null, 0, a.jsyjtzs)) * decode(a.sldwse, null, 0, a.sldwse) - decode(a.ynse_1, null, 0, a.ynse_1) as ybtse from jc_swcljdqkb a where zsxm_dm != '10101' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and jcajxxuuid in (#macroparam#) union all select jcajxxuuid, decode(xxsesbs, null, 0, xxsesbs) + decode(xxsetzse, null, 0, xxsetzse) - decode(xxsetjse, null, 0, xxsetjse) - decode(jxsesbs, null, 0, jxsesbs) - decode(jxsetzse, null, 0, jxsetzse) + decode(jxsetjse, null, 0, jxsetjse) - decode(ldsetze, null, 0, ldsetze) - decode(ynsesbs, null, 0, ynsesbs) as ybtse from jc_swcljdqkb a where zsxm_dm = '10101' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and jcajxxuuid in (#macroparam#)) select jcajxxuuid from m group by jcajxxuuid having sum (m.ybtse) > 1000000

select y.JCAYXXUUID, y.JCAYBH, y.DJXH, y.ZCAJBH, y.ZCAJMC, y.AYSZJG_DM, y.AYSZBM_DM, y.LRR_DM, y.LRRQ, y.XGR_DM, y.XGRQ, y.LCSLID, y.SJGSDQ, y.ZFBZ_1, y.ZFRQ_1, y.ZFR_DM, y.AJLX_DM, y.AYNCLYJSM, y.WSBH, y.XGCL, y.ZYNR, y.JLR_DM, y.JLRQ, y.NCLCBDW, y.NCLCBRQ, y.NCLYHFRQ, y.QDTJ, y.SSWFLX_DM, y.AJCLYJ_DM, y.QDSX, y.JCAJXXUUID, y.BABZ, y.NSRSBH, y.NSRMC, y.HY_DM, y.DJZCLX_DM, y.ZGSWJG_DM, y.SWJCAYZT_DM from jc_ayxx y, jc_ajxx j where y.jcajxxuuid = j.jcajxxuuid and j.jcajbh = ?
select d.* from jc_lhcjgzcxtjbd d where d.lhcjgzcxtjbuuid=? and d.zfbz_1='N'

select t.swjczblsqbzbuuid, t.swjczblsqbuuid, t.czrxm, t.sfzjhm, t.zp, t.gzdw, t.jcfw, t.jczz, t.fzjg, t.yxrqq, t.yxrqz, t.swjczbllx_dm, t.bfyy, t.bgyy, t.yswjczh, t.blzt_dm, t.fjuuid, t.spbz, nvl(t.lssqbz,'N') lssqbz, t.swjczbluuid from jc_swjczblsqb_zb t where t.spbz = 'Y' and t.swjczblsqbuuid = $uuid$
select t.* from jc_swjcajqlsqb t where t.ajqlsqbuuid = $uuid$
select t.ssnd, t.nsrdzdah, t.tyshxym, t.dxlb_dm, t.sfjljh from jk_ssjay_tsmx_zddx t where t.nsrdzdah = ?
select t.* from jc_zdsswfajxxgbdjb t where t.zdsswfajxxgbdjbuuid = $uuid$ and NVL(t.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT T1.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID, T2.SBZJDTXXBNLJFSSL, T2.SHXCBNLJFSSL, T2.BQAJGBBNLJFSSL, T2.LHCJXXJHBNLJFSSL, T2.ZDJSBNLJFSSL, T2.WUJGPDWDJNSXYDJBNLJFSSL, T2.ZZCJBNLJFSBKSL, T3.CYKZSCXKZFFBQFSTSSL, T3.XZDRXGZWBNLJFSTSSL, T3.JRJGRZSXCKBNLJFSTSSL, T3.JZBFGXFXWBNLJFSSQRMFYQZZXSL, T3.TGQYXYXXGSXTXSHGSBNLJFSTSSL, T4.XZCSHLWXXFWBNLJFSTSSL, T4.XZQDZFGYTDBNLJFSTSSL, T4.QHJYJYJDGLBNLJFSTSSL, T4.JZCJZFCGHDBNLJFSTSSL, T4.JZSYHGRZQYGLBNLJFSTSSL, T5.XZCYYGGGZYJYHDBNLJFSTSSL, T5.XZCYJCSSHGYSYTXJYBNLJFSTSSL, T5.XZZQQHSCBFJYXWBNLJFSTSSL, T5.XZBXSCBFJYXWBNLJFSTSSL, T5.JZSRSFGLQYBNLJFSTSSL, T6.DSXZCZYRYDSSSCHHYJRBNLJFSTSSL, T6.CXRYCHQXCJPXPYZGBNLJFSTSSL, T6.XZZFXZJZCBNLJFSTSSL, T6.XZQYZQFXBNLJFSTSSL, T6.XZJKGSPEFPBNLJFSTSSL, T7.DSXHYSXJGHYNTBPPDBNLJFSXZSL, T7.QHWHGLBNLJFSXZSL, T7.TGZYXWWZXSHGBBNLJFSXCSL, T7.QTXMBNLJFSTSSL FROM JC_LHCJGZCXTJB T1, JC_LHCJGZCXTJBA T2, JC_LHCJGZCXTJBB T3, JC_LHCJGZCXTJBC T4, JC_LHCJGZCXTJBD T5, JC_LHCJGZCXTJBE T6, JC_LHCJGZCXTJBF T7 WHERE T1.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID = T2.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID AND T1.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID = T3.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID AND T1.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID = T4.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID AND T1.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID = T5.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID AND T1.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID = T6.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID AND T1.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID = T7.LHCJGZCXTJBUUID AND T1.SSQQ >= ? AND T1.SSQZ <= ? AND T1.SWJG_DM = ? AND T1.ZFBZ_1=?

select jcajxxuuid, skssqq, wfwzlx_dm, case when zsxm_dm = '10101' then decode(xxsesbs, null, 0, xxsesbs) + decode(xxsetzse, null, 0, xxsetzse) - decode(xxsetjse, null, 0, xxsetjse) - decode(jxsesbs, null, 0, jxsesbs) - decode(jxsetzse, null, 0, jxsetzse) + decode(jxsetjse, null, 0, jxsetjse) - decode(ldsetze, null, 0, ldsetze) - decode(ynsesbs, null, 0, ynsesbs) else (decode(a.jsyjsbs, null, 0, a.jsyjsbs) + decode(a.jsyjtzs, null, 0, a.jsyjtzs)) * decode(a.sldwse, null, 0, a.sldwse) - decode(a.ynse_1, null, 0, a.ynse_1) end as ybtse, case when zsxm_dm = '10101' then decode(xxsesbs, null, 0, xxsesbs) + decode(xxsetzse, null, 0, xxsetzse) - decode(xxsetjse, null, 0, xxsetjse) - decode(jxsesbs, null, 0, jxsesbs) - decode(jxsetzse, null, 0, jxsetzse) + decode(jxsetjse, null, 0, jxsetjse) - decode(ldsetze, null, 0, ldsetze) else (decode(a.jsyjsbs, null, 0, a.jsyjsbs) + decode(a.jsyjtzs, null, 0, a.jsyjtzs)) * decode(a.sldwse, null, 0, a.sldwse) end as ynse1 from jc_swcljdqkb a where jcajxxuuid in (#macroparam#) and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM JC_AYXX_SWSXTZS_MXB T WHERE T.TZSUUID = $uuid$ AND T.DZBZDSZL_DM = $value$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select t.ZDSSWFAJBQDCBUUID, t.JCAJXXUUID, t.JCAYXXUUID, t.DZBZDSZL_DM, t.SWJCAJDBJB_DM, t.WSBH, t.DCBSWJG_DM, t.DJXH, t.JCSWJG_DM, t.LXRXM, t.LXDH, t.FSCL, t.CZRY_DM, t.CZRQ_1, t.BQSWJG_DM, t.SWJGJG, t.ZG, t.NH, t.WH, t.ZSR_DM, t.ZSRQ_3, t.LCSLID, t.HDSLID, t.SJSLID, t.ZSTYBZ, t.DCBBZ, t.ccfajtnr, t.SQDSSHLY, t.bqswjghjcj_Dm, t.dcbswjgjcj_dm from JC_ZDSSWFAJBQDCBXXB t where t.djxh = $uuid$ and t.swjcajdbjb_dm = '1'
SELECT T.* FROM JC_ZDSSWFAJJABG T WHERE NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND T.JCAJXXUUID = $uuid$ AND T.LCSLID = $lcslid$ ORDER BY T.LRRQ DESC

SELECT T.ZJBHUUID, T.UUID, T.SWJGJG, T.ZG, T.NH, T.WH, T.ZJSWJG_DM, T.JSSWJG_DM, T.ZBSX, T.HFJZRQ, T.WSZZRQ, T.SFXYHF, T.DZ, T.LXRY, T.LXDH, T.DZBZDSZL_DM, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM FROM JC_ZJBH T WHERE T.ZJBHUUID = $uuid$
select t. * from JC_FCJL t where t.fcajqcuuid= $uuid$ AND nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = $zfbz1$ order by t.lrrq desc

select * from jc_lhcjgzcxtjb t where nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.lhcjgzcxtjbuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.lcslid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR t.swjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ((t.ssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.ssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) OR (t.ssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.ssqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) OR (t.ssqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND t.ssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))))
select distinct c.znj_zspm_dm from dm_gy_zspm d, CS_ZS_ZNJDZB c where d.zspm_dm = c.zspm_dm and d.zsxm_dm = ? and c.skzl_dm = ?
update jc_ayxx_swsxtzs_mxb t set t.yzpzxh = ?, t.xgr_dm = ?, t.xgrq = ? where t.tzsuuid = ?
SELECT * FROM jc_sswfwtgjjsb a WHERE a.jcajxxuuid = $uuid$ and NVL(a.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'
SELECT T.* FROM JC_ZZSYBNSRLDSKJSMXB T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR T.JCAJXXUUID = ?)
select t.* from jc_zdsswfajxxgxsqb t where t.zdsswfajxxgxsqbuuid = $uuid$ and yxbz='Y'
select t.* from jc_swjcajyjzljjqd t where t.jcajyjzljjqduuid = $uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 = $value$
select a.* from jk_ssjay_tsmx_jcdx a where a.clzt='1' and a.yxbz='Y' and a.ay_bh=?

select cfqk.swxzcfqkbjccfcfqkuuid, cfqk.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid, cfqk.xh, cfqk.zsxm_dm, cfqk.zspm_dm, cfqk.cfyj, cfqk.ncfbs, cfqk.ybtse, cfqk.ncfje, cfqk.lrrq, cfqk.lrr_dm, cfqk.xgrq, cfqk.xgr_dm, cfqk.sjgsdq, cfqk.yzpzxh, cfqk.zszspm_dm, cfqk.skssqq, cfqk.skssqz, cfqk.sjtb_sj, cfqk.cflx_dm, cfqk.mswfsdje, cfqk.sswflx_dm, cfqk.wfsd_dm, cfqk.zgswjg_dm, cfqk.hy_dm, cfqk.zgswskfj_dm, cfqk.djxh, cfqk.zfbz_1, cfqk.zfr_dm, cfqk.zfsj, cfqk.swxzcfjdsuuid, cfqk.wfcd_dm, cfjds.swxzcfjdsuuid, cfjds.swjgjg, cfjds.zg, cfjds.nh, cfjds.wh, cfjds.swjgjg || ' ' || cfjds.zg || '〔' || cfjds.nh || '〕' || cfjds.wh || ' 号' wszg,ajxx.jcajbh,ajxx.djxh from fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk cfqk, fz_swxzcfjds cfjds, jc_ajxx ajxx, fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf jccf where cfqk.swxzcfjdsuuid = cfjds.swxzcfjdsuuid and ajxx.jcajxxuuid = jccf.jcajxxuuid and cfqk.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid = jccf.swxzcfqkbjccfuuid and nvl(cfqk.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(cfjds.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or ajxx.jcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ajxx.jcajxxuuid = ?)
SELECT T.* FROM JC_AYCX T WHERE T.UUID = $uuid$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

SELECT A.* FROM JC_AYXX A, JC_AYXXTHBZH B WHERE A.JCAYXXUUID = B.JCAYXXUUID AND B.DJXH = ? AND B.DZBZDSZL_DM IN ('BDA1120307', 'BDA0020007') AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND B.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND NVL(A.JCAJXXUUID, 'X') = 'X' ORDER BY A.LRRQ DESC

select b.ajbh, a.jcajbh, a.ajmc, a.djxh, a.jcajxxuuid, b.ycqx, b.ajlb, b.ljrq, b.ajbgqx, b.mj_dm, b.swjcajuuid, b.swjg_dm from jc_ajxx a, Jc_Swjcaj b where a.jcajxxuuid = b.jcajxxuuid and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(b.xhbz, 'N') = 'N' and b.ajbgqx in (#macroparam#) and add_months( b.ljrq, ((case b.ajbgqx when 206 then 10 else 30 end) + to_number( nvl(b.ycqx, '0'))) * 12 ) <= sysdate and b.swjg_dm in (select t.swjg_dm from qx_swjg_zns t start with t.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior t.swjg_dm = t.sjswjg_dm ) and (1 = #macroparam# OR b.ajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR a.jcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR a.ajmc like ?)
SELECT T.* FROM JC_AYXXTHBZH T WHERE T.AYXXTHBZHUUID = $uuid$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select a.jcajxxuuid, a.djxh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, a.jcajbh, a.JCSSQJQ, a.JCSSQJz, c.WFWZLX_DM as SSWFLX_DM, c.WFWZXW_DM as SSWFSD_DM, b.WFSS as wfss, b.CLJDJYJ as cljd, a.AJSZJG_DM from jc_ajxx a, jc_swcljds b, jc_swcljdqkb c where a.jcajxxuuid = b.jcajxxuuid(+) and b.SWCLJDSUUID = c.SWCLJDSUUID(+) and a.jcajxxuuid = ? and NVL(b.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and NVL(c.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select t.jcajxxuuid from jc_swcljdqkb t where t.wfwzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.jcajxxuuid in(#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.wfwzxw_dm in (#macroparam#))

SELECT A.DJXH, A.JCAYXXUUID, '' AS JCAJXXUUID, A.JCAYBH, A.NSRSBH, A.NSRMC, '' AS JCBM_DM, A.SWJCAYZT_DM, '' AS AJJCZT_DM, A.AJCLYJ_DM FROM JC_AYXX A WHERE NVL(A.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.JCAYBH = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.NSRSBH = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.AJCLYJ_DM = #macroparam#)
select y.* from jc_ayxx y where y.qdlyuuid = ? and y.qdtj = ? and nvl(y.zfbz_1, 'N') = ? order by lrrq desc
SELECT * FROM JC_AYXX T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND NVL(T.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND T.SWJCAYZT_DM IN (#macroparam#)
select t.* from Jc_Swjcaj t where t.swjcajuuid = $uuid$

SELECT A.ZSSJ AS ZZRQ FROM JC_SSWFAJTSCLSQB A WHERE A.SSWFAJTSCLSQBUUID = ? AND A.BZ_1 = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT C.LRRQ AS ZZRQ FROM JC_ZDSSWFAJTSCLSQB B, JC_ZDSSWFAJTSCLPF C WHERE B.ZDSSWFAJTSCLSQBUUID = C.ZDSSWFAJTSCLSQBUUID AND B.ZDSSWFAJTSCLSQBUUID = ? AND B.BZ_1 = 'N'
select * from jk_ssjay_tsmx_jcry a where a.yxbz='Y' and a.jcajxxuuid=$uuid$
select bg.* from jc_jcjhzxqkpgbg bg where bg.jcjhzxqkpgbguuid = $uuid$ and nvl(bg.zfbz_1, 'N') = $value1$

SELECT A.DJXH, A.JCAYXXUUID, C.JCAJXXUUID, A.JCAYBH, A.NSRSBH, A.NSRMC, B.JCBM_DM, A.SWJCAYZT_DM, C.AJJCZT_DM, A.AJCLYJ_DM FROM JC_AYXX A, JC_LASQB B, JC_AJXX C WHERE A.JCAYXXUUID = B.JCAYXXUUID(+) AND A.JCAJXXUUID = C.JCAJXXUUID(+) AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(B.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(C.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.JCAYBH = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.NSRSBH = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.AJCLYJ_DM = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR B.JCBM_DM IN #macroparam#)
select * from jc_swjcgzdg t where (t.jcajxxuuid = ? or t.jcajbh = ?) and t.dzbzdszl_dm = ? and nvl(t.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select a.djxh, a.jcajbh as wfxwbh, a.ajmc as wfxwmc from jc_gfjcajxx a where (a.zfbz_1 = 'N' or a.zfbz_1 is null) and a.gfjcajzt_dm not in ('01', '02') and a.djxh = $uuid$

select g.*, a.jcajxxuuid, a.jcajbh, a.ajmc, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.djxh from jc_zdsswfajxxgbdjb g, jc_ajxx a where g.jcajxxuuid = a.jcajxxuuid and g.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm) and g.ajzt_dm = ? and nvl(g.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'
select f.* from jc_lhcjgzcxtjbf f where f.lhcjgzcxtjbuuid=? and f.zfbz_1='N'

select b.jcajxxuuid, sum(b.ybtse) as ybtse, sum(b.ynse) as ynse from (select jcajxxuuid, skssqq, (decode(a.jsyjsbs, null, 0, a.jsyjsbs) + decode(a.jsyjtzs, null, 0, a.jsyjtzs)) * decode(a.sldwse, null, 0, a.sldwse) - decode(a.ynse_1, null, 0, a.ynse_1) as ybtse, (decode(a.jsyjsbs, null, 0, a.jsyjsbs) + decode(a.jsyjtzs, null, 0, a.jsyjtzs)) * decode(a.sldwse, null, 0, a.sldwse) as ynse from jc_swcljdqkb a where jcajxxuuid in (#macroparam#) and a.zsxm_dm != '10101' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' union all select jcajxxuuid, skssqq, decode(xxsesbs, null, 0, xxsesbs) + decode(xxsetzse, null, 0, xxsetzse) - decode(xxsetjse, null, 0, xxsetjse) - decode(jxsesbs, null, 0, jxsesbs) - decode(jxsetzse, null, 0, jxsetzse) + decode(jxsetjse, null, 0, jxsetjse) - decode(ldsetze, null, 0, ldsetze) - decode(ynsesbs, null, 0, ynsesbs) as ybtse, decode(xxsesbs, null, 0, xxsesbs) + decode(xxsetzse, null, 0, xxsetzse) - decode(xxsetjse, null, 0, xxsetjse) - decode(jxsesbs, null, 0, jxsesbs) - decode(jxsetzse, null, 0, jxsetzse) + decode(jxsetjse, null, 0, jxsetjse) - decode(ldsetze, null, 0, ldsetze) as ynse from jc_swcljdqkb a where jcajxxuuid in (#macroparam#) and a.zsxm_dm = '10101' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N') b group by b.jcajxxuuid, to_char(b.skssqq, 'YYYY') having sum(b.ybtse) > 0 and sum(b.ynse) > 0 and sum(b.ybtse) / sum(b.ynse) > 0.1
select z.* from jc_zdsswfajxxgx_zb z where z.zdsswfajxxgxsqbuuid = $uuid$ and z.zfbz_1 = $zfbz1$
select bg.* from jc_jcjhzxqkpgbg bg where bg.jcjhuuid = $uuid$ and nvl(bg.zfbz_1, 'N') = $value1$
select * from jc_skjnqkmxb a where a.zdsswfajxxgbdjbuuid=$uuid$
select jdxz_dm,swjg_dm from CS_DJ_JDXZSWJGDZB where xybz='Y' and yxbz='Y' and jdxz_dm =?

SELECT aj.JCAJBH, aj.djxh, qkb.zsxm_dm, qkb.zspm_dm, qkb.skssqq, qkb.skssqz, qkb.yzpzxh, qkb.ybtse, qkb.zgswskfj_dm, qkb.sldwse, qkb.sldwse, qkb.ynse_1 FROM JC_AJXX aj, jc_swcljdqkb qkb WHERE aj.jcajxxuuid = qkb.jcajxxuuid and qkb.djxh = ? and qkb.sybh_2 = ? and qkb.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and qkb.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and qkb.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#) and qkb.zspm_dm in (#macroparam#) AND nvl(aj.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(qkb.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and qkb.yzpzxh is not null and aj.ajjczt_dm in ('500', '501', '502', '503')

select a.* from JK_SSJAY_TSMX_JCDX a where (a.yxbz is null or a.yxbz = 'Y') and (a.CLZT IS NULL OR a.CLZT = '0') and a.jcjg_dm=? and (1 = #macroparam# or a.NSRDZDAH = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.fa_bh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.ssnd = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT AY.JCAYBH, AJ.AJMC, AY.DJXH, AY.NSRSBH, AY.NSRMC, AY.ZDJCDXJB_DM, AY.SWJCAYZT_DM, AJ.AJJCZT_DM, AY.JCAYXXUUID, AY.JCAJXXUUID FROM JC_AYXX AY, JC_AYXX_LYMX MX, JC_AJXX AJ WHERE AY.JCAYXXUUID = MX.JCAYXXUUID AND AY.JCAJXXUUID = AJ.JCAJXXUUID(+) AND NVL(AY.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND AY.SWJCAYZT_DM != '13' AND NVL(AJ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(AJ.AJJCZT_DM, 'X99') IN #macroparam# AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.NSRSBH = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.NSRMC = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.ZGSWJG_DM = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.HY_DM = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR MX.JCAYXXLY_DM = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.AJCLYJ_DM = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.JCAYBH = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.SWJCAYZT_DM = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (AJ.AJJCZT_DM = #macroparam# AND NVL(AJ.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.JLRQ = TO_DATE(#macroparam#, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR AY.DJZCLX_DM = #macroparam#)

SELECT A.DJXH, A.JCAYXXUUID, '' AS JCAJXXUUID, A.JCAYBH, A.NSRSBH, A.NSRMC, B.JCBM_DM, A.SWJCAYZT_DM, '' AS AJJCZT_DM, A.AJCLYJ_DM FROM JC_AYXX A, JC_LASQB B WHERE A.JCAYXXUUID = B.JCAYXXUUID(+) AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND NVL(B.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.JCAYBH = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.NSRSBH = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.AJCLYJ_DM = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR B.JCBM_DM IN #macroparam#)

select a.jcajxxuuid, a.djxh, a.nsrsbh, a.nsrmc, a.jcajbh, a.ajmc, a.jcssqjq as jcssqq, a.jcssqjz as jcssqz, b.zdsswfajxxgbdjbuuid, b.jfypjqddsjzrrxm as jfypjqddsjzrrxm, b.jfypjqddsjzrrxb_dm as jfypjqddsjzrrxb, b.jfypjqddsjzrrzjmc, b.jfypjqddsjzrrzjzjhm as jfypjqddsjzrrzjhm, b.jfypjqdfyzjzzdcwryxm as jfypjqdfyzjzrdcwryxm, b.jfypjqdfyzjzzdcwryxb as jfypjqdfyzjzrdcwryxb, b.jfypjqdfyzjzzdcwryzjmc as jfypjqdfyzjzrdcwryzjmc, b.jfypjqdfyzjzzdcwrysfzhm as jfypjqdfyzjzrdcwryzjhm, b.qtzfjgpjws as qtzfjgpjwszg, b.qtzfjgpjwsmc, b.qtzfjgpjwssdsj, b.qtzfwsnr, d.wfwzlx_dm as wfwzlx, d.wfwzxw_dm as wfwzsd, c.wfss, c.cljdjyj as cljd, b.ajzt_dm as ajzt, b.ggrq from jc_ajxx a, jc_zdsswfajxxgbdjb b, jc_swcljds c, jc_swcljdqkb d where a.jcajxxuuid = b.jcajxxuuid(+) and a.jcajxxuuid = c.jcajxxuuid(+) and c.swcljdsuuid = d.swcljdsuuid(+) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.jcajbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.ggrq >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.ggrq <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and b.ajzt_dm=? and nvl(b.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N' and nvl(a.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

select FXMXXH, FXYDXH, FXXXXH, DJXH, NSRSBH, NSRMC, NSRSSSWJG_DM, NSRSSSWJGMC, ZB_DM_1, ZBMC_2, ZBZ, ZBFZ, TSXX, YJSX, YJXX, FXQJQ, FXQJZ, MXLYLX, SCSJ, SCRY_DM, SCRYXM, SCSWJG_DM_1, SCSWJGMC, CLZT, CLSJ, SJJHCGBZ, SJJHSJ from TD_FXMX_JCXAB where FXYDXH = $uuid$
SELECT T.* FROM JC_AYXXTHBZH T WHERE T.LCSLID = $lcslid$ AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

SELECT J.SSWFXWJJDJBUUID, J.JCAJXXUUID, J.WSBH AS YWSBH, J.BJJRDJXH, J.BJJRMC, J.BJJRNSRSBH, J.ZSSJ AS pzzcclrq, J.JJZYNR, J.LCSLID, J.ZSBZ, J.SPYJ, J.BJJRFDDBRXM, J.AJSZJG_DM, J.AJCLYJ_DM, J.BJJRDJZCLX_DM, J.BJJRFZRXM, J.BJJRDZ, J.BJJRLXDH, J.BJJRSZDW, (SELECT MIN(R.JJRQ_1) FROM JC_SSWFXWJJDJB_JJRXX R where r.sswfxwjjdjbuuid = j.sswfxwjjdjbuuid) JJRQ_1 FROM JC_SSWFXWJJDJB J WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR J.bjjrmc like ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR J.bjjrnsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR J.bjjrfddbrxm like ?) and J.ajszjg_dm = ? and J.ajclyj_dm = '03' and j.sswfxwjjdjbuuid not in (select l.sswfxwjjdjbuuid from Jc_Zcjjclxhlb l where nvl(l.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N') and nvl(J.zfbz_1, 'N') = 'N'

SELECT A.JCAJXXUUID, A.JCAJBH, A.AJMC, A.ZGSWJG_DM, A.DJXH, B.* FROM JC_AJXX A, JC_JCJYS B WHERE A.JCAJXXUUID = B.JCAJXXUUID AND A.JCAJXXUUID = ? AND NVL(B.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ? AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT JCAJXXUUID FROM JC_ZGJYS C WHERE C.JCAJXXUUID = A.JCAJXXUUID AND NVL(C.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ?)

select a.jcajxxuuid, a.djxh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, a.jcajbh, a.JCSSQJQ, a.JCSSQJz, c.WFWZLX_DM as SSWFLX_DM, c.WFWZXW_DM as SSWFSD_DM, b.WFSS as wfss, b.CLJDJYJ as cljd, a.AJSZJG_DM from jc_ajxx a, jc_swcljds b, jc_swcljdqkb c where a.jcajxxuuid = b.jcajxxuuid(+) and b.SWCLJDSUUID = c.SWCLJDSUUID(+) and c.WFWZLX_DM in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.WFWZXW_DM in (#macroparam#)) and a.jcajxxuuid in (#macroparam#) and NVL(b.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and NVL(c.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' union all select jcajxxuuid, a.djxh, nsrsbh, nsrmc, a.jcajbh, a.JCSSQJQ, a.JCSSQJz, c.SSWFLX_DM as SSWFLX_DM, c.WFSD_DM as SSWFSD_DM, b.WFSS as wfss, b.CFJD as cljd, a.AJSZJG_DM from jc_ajxx a, fz_swxzcfjds b, fz_swxzcfqkb_jccf_cfqk c where a.jcajxxuuid = b.SSWFXWDJUUID(+) and b.SWXZCFJDSUUID = c.SWXZCFJDSUUID(+) and c.SSWFLX_DM in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.WFSD_DM in (#macroparam#)) and a.jcajxxuuid in (#macroparam#) and NVL(b.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N' and NVL(c.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = 'N'
select jgznxh, zn_dm, swjg_dm, sjswjg_dm, ccm from QX_SWJG_ZNS t where nvl(t.yxbz, 'Y') = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm = ? and t.zn_dm = ?

select m.MXBUUID, m.TZSUUID, m.ZSXM_DM, m.ZSPM_DM, m.SKSSQQ, m.SKSSQZ, m.JSJE, m.SL_1, m.YBSE, m.DZBZDSZL_DM, m.YZPZXH, m.HY_DM, m.SFXCZNJQS, m.ZSZM_DM from jc_ayxx_swsxtzs t, jc_ayxx_swsxtzs_mxb m where t.tzsuuid = m.tzsuuid and t.jcayxxuuid = $uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select y.* from jc_ayxx y where y.zcajbh = ? and y.swjcayzt_dm = ? and nvl(y.zfbz_1,'N') = ?
select t.* from jc_swjcajyjzljjqd t where t.sjslid = $uuid$ and t.zfbz_1 = $value$
